description: Business policy settings entity representing configuration for invoice and credit note numbering, prefixes, and business policy mode (strict vs flex). These settings control how invoices and credit notes are numbered and whether documents can be edited after issuance.

business_uid.description: Unique identifier of the business that owns these policy settings.

next_invoice_number.description: The next sequential number to be used for invoice numbering. This value is automatically incremented when a new invoice is created. Minimum value is 1, maximum value is 9,999,999.

next_credit_note_number.description: The next sequential number to be used for credit note numbering. This value is automatically incremented when a new credit note is created. Minimum value is 1, maximum value is 9,999,999.

numbering_type.description: The numbering scheme for invoices and credit notes. 'continuous' means numbers increment indefinitely (e.g., 1, 2, 3, ...). 'reset_yearly' means numbering resets to 1 at the start of each calendar year and includes a year prefix (e.g., 2025-0001, 2025-0002, ..., then 2026-0001, 2026-0002, ...).

prefix_enabled.description: Whether custom text prefixes are enabled for invoice and credit note numbers. When enabled, the prefix text will appear before the number (e.g., 'INV-0001', 'CN-0001').

invoice_prefix_text.description: Custom prefix text for invoice numbers (e.g., 'INV', 'INVOICE'). Only applied when prefix_enabled is true. Maximum 50 characters. Can be null when no prefix is set or prefix_enabled is false.

credit_note_prefix_text.description: Custom prefix text for credit note numbers (e.g., 'CN', 'CREDIT'). Only applied when prefix_enabled is true. Maximum 50 characters. Can be null when no prefix is set or prefix_enabled is false.

created_at.description: The date and time when the business policy settings were created, in ISO 8601 format.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the business policy settings were last updated, in ISO 8601 format.
